job.title: Staff Software Engineer (Servicenow service portal)
job.description:
Role: Staff Software Engineer (Servicenow service portal)

 Location: Santa Clara/Remote

 Duration: Long term

 W2 Candidate

This position is not open for C2C


Must have non-negotiable

  • 3+ years experience with Servicenow service portal.
  • 8 years for software development experience (Front end)

What you'll do in this role:

  • Build high-quality, clean, scalable and reusable code by enforcing best practices around software engineering architecture and processes (Code Reviews, Unit testing, etc.)
  • Work with the product owners to understand detailed requirements and own your code from design, implementation, test automation and delivery of high-quality products to our users.
  • Design software that is simple to use to allow customers to extend and customize the functionality to meet their specific needs
  • Contribute to the design and implementation of new products and features while also enhancing the existing product suite
  • Be a mentor for colleagues and help promote knowledge-sharing

What you will need for this role to be successful:

  • 4+ years of experience in ServiceNow’s service portal custom applications development
  • 8 years of experience in the development of custom applications using Java, JavaScript, jQuery, AngularJS, and ReactJS. (Both client and service side scripting)
  • Has technical knowledge building REST/SOAP-based APIs.
  • Deep knowledge of AJAX, JSON, HTML, XML, CSS, REST, HighCharts and associated frameworks
  • Understanding of dependency injection and unit-testing principles
  • Understanding of functional programming paradigm
  • Experience with relational databases and SQL
  • Deep understanding of design patterns
  • Strong verbal and written communication skills.
